/* eslint-disable react/prop-types */ import React from 'react'; import './films-details.css'; export default function FilmsDetails({ film }) { const { id, name, director, species, people, planets, vehicles, starships, } = film; return (

{name}

  • Episode {episodeId}
  • Opening Crawl {openingCrawl}
  • Director {director}
); }
